item.title: ​8 Beautiful Unseen Deep Space Pictures Captured By NASA​ - Times Now
item.description:
8 Beautiful Unseen Deep Space Pictures Captured By NASA

Date: Jan 2, 2025 | Source: Times Now

This article showcases eight stunning images captured by NASA, revealing the breathtaking beauty and complexity of deep space. Each image highlights various celestial phenomena as observed by the Hubble Space Telescope.

  • Arp-Madore 2339-661: Interacting galaxies that highlight complex gravitational interactions.
  • XZ Tauri: A multiple star system expelling hot gas bubbles, showcasing star formation.
  • From Dim To Dazzling: A vibrant star-forming region within the Milky Way.
  • A Spiral Star Factory: The spiral galaxy NGC 5668 known for its star formation.
  • Stellar Ensemble In NGC 6357: A star cluster that ionizes parts of the emission nebula.
  • Stellar Remnant SNR 0509-68.7: A supernova remnant closely studied by astronomers.
  • NGC 6302: A planetary nebula, known as the butterfly nebula, formed by a fading star.
  • AFGL 5180: A star-forming region providing insights into solar system formation.
"These images not only mesmerize but also promote an understanding of the universe we inhabit." - TN Tech Desk

In conclusion, these breathtaking images taken by NASA serve as a reminder of the vast beauty and complexity of the universe, inspiring curiosity and further exploration.

item.description:

Date: January 2, 2025

Source: CNBC TV18

Reports indicate that gunfire erupted at the Amazura event hall in Jamaica, Queens, resulting in at least 11 injuries.

  • The shooting occurred around 11:20 PM on January 1.
  • Details on the conditions of the injured individuals have not been released by the NYPD yet.
  • The incident is part of a growing concern over gun violence in the United States.
“At least 11 people have been shot in Queens, NY at Amazura Night Club. This is still an ACTIVE situation.” — Nick Sortor

This shooting adds to the troubling pattern of violent incidents affecting public safety in the US.

item.title: Eclipse, Meteors, Auroras, Supermoon in 2025 - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
Celestial Events to Look Forward to in 2025: Eclipses, Supermoons, and More

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: AP News

The year 2025 will feature a series of spectacular astronomical events including eclipses, supermoons, and a parade of planets. Stargazers can expect multiple opportunities to witness these cosmic occurrences, enhancing the viewing experience for enthusiasts.

  • January will kick off with a six-planet parade visible for an extended period.
  • The first lunar eclipse will occur on March 14, followed by a partial solar eclipse two weeks later.
  • Three supermoons are expected in October, November, and December, with the closest occurring in November.
  • A line-up of six planets will be visible around mid-January.
  • Geomagnetic storms may lead to enhanced displays of the northern and southern lights throughout the year.
  • Popular meteor showers such as the Perseids and Geminids will peak in August and December.
“People should go out and see them sometime during the next many weeks. I certainly will,” said Bruce Betts, chief scientist at the Planetary Society.

In conclusion, astronomy enthusiasts have much to look forward to in 2025, with various celestial events expected to delight and inspire star watchers around the globe.

item.title: Why do women have high pain tolerance? Is it a healthy trait? - The Times of India
item.description:
Why do women have high pain tolerance? Is it a healthy trait?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Women possess a remarkable capacity to endure various forms of pain, with their pain tolerance being influenced by biological, hormonal, and psychological factors.

  • Dr. Astha Dayal highlights that women's pain tolerance may be linked to evolutionary adaptations, particularly regarding childbirth.
  • Hormonal aspects, especially estrogen, play a significant role in pain perception and tolerance.
  • Women are encouraged to address pain, as ignoring it can lead to negative health outcomes.
  • Societal conditioning often leads women to view pain as an expected part of life, which can discourage open discussions about discomfort.
  • Dr. Sameer Malhotra notes the subjective nature of pain and how it can be influenced by various factors, including social expectations.
  • Acknowledging pain is viewed as an act of self-care rather than weakness, promoting better health outcomes.
“Pain is often the body’s first alert to something amiss.”

In conclusion, while women's high pain tolerance can be seen as resilience, it is essential to recognize and address pain appropriately to maintain overall health and well-being.

item.title: OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Week: Expected Price, Full Specifications, How To Watch OnePlus Event Live - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Week: Expected Price, Full Specifications, How To Watch OnePlus Event Live

Publication Date: January 1, 2023 Source: Tech News Network

OnePlus is all set to host its Winter Event on January 7, unveiling its flagship smartphones, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, in India. These devices have already launched in China and have generated a lot of excitement among Indian fans.

  • The OnePlus 13 is expected to be priced between Rs 67,000 and Rs 70,000 in India.
  • It features a 6.82-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, promising high performance.
  • Camera system includes three 50MP sensors co-engineered with Hasselblad.
  • Expected to come with a 6,000mAh battery supporting 100W fast charging.
  • Live streaming of the event will be available on the official OnePlus website and YouTube channel.
"Tune in on January 7 to catch all the action as it happens."

The launch of the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R promises to be an exciting event packed with innovation and premium features, reflecting OnePlus's commitment to the Indian market.

item.title: 2025’s first meteor shower 'Quadrantid' to light up the skies: Where to watch in India - The Times of India
item.description:
2025’s first meteor shower 'Quadrantid' to light up the skies: When to watch in India

Date: Not provided Source: Not provided

The Quadrantid meteor shower will be visible this January, providing an opportunity for sky watchers in India to enjoy a spectacular celestial show.

  • The peak of the shower is expected to occur on January 4th, 2025.
  • Observers should look towards the northeast sky for the best view.
  • Ideal viewing conditions require a dark, clear sky away from city lights.
  • Up to 120 meteors per hour can be seen at the peak.
"Enjoying a meteor shower is one of the most beautiful experiences for stargazers."

In conclusion, the Quadrantid meteor shower promises to be a highlight for astronomy enthusiasts early in 2025.

item.title: Supreme Court to hear AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi's plea on places of worship law - The Hindu
item.description:
Supreme Court to Hear Asaduddin Owaisi's Plea on Places of Worship Law

Date: January 02, 2025
Source: The Hindu

The Supreme Court is set to hear AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi's plea regarding the 1991 places of worship law, which mandates maintaining the religious character of places as they were on August 15, 1947. The hearing follows a recent Supreme Court ruling that halted fresh litigations against the law.

  • Owaisi filed his plea on December 17, 2024, through advocate Fuzail Ahmad Ayyubi.
  • The 1991 law prohibits changing the religious character of places of worship as they existed in 1947.
  • A recent Supreme Court order restrained courts from taking on new suits regarding the religious character of several mosques.
  • Cases concerning various religious sites, including Gyanvapi, Shahi Idgah, and Shahi Jama Masjid, have been stalled pending the court's review.
  • The Muslim side has filed pleas for the law's strict enforcement to maintain communal peace.
“The petitions challenging the law were filed with 'mischievous intent' to facilitate lawsuits against these religious sites.”

This upcoming hearing may tag Owaisi's plea with existing cases regarding the law's implementation and its implications for communal harmony.

item.title: Don't Miss Out! Air India Express New Year Sale. Flight ticket fares starting from just ₹1,448 | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Don’t Miss Out! Air India Express New Year Sale. Flight ticket fares starting from just ₹1,448

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] | Source: Live Mint

Air India Express has introduced a New Year Sale featuring flight fares as low as ₹1,448, available for bookings until January 5, for travel between January 8 and September 20, 2025.

  • Fares start at ₹1,448 under the Lite offer and ₹1,599 under the Value offer.
  • The Lite Offer is exclusive to logged-in loyalty members on the airline’s website or mobile app.
  • Included in the fare are base fare, taxes, and airport charges, but not convenience fees.
  • NeuCoins will be credited post-journey, based on passenger details matching government IDs.
  • Offers are subject to availability and cannot be canceled for a full refund.
  • Air India Express reserves the right to modify or terminate the offer at any time without notice.
“The Airline reserves the right to cancel, terminate, or suspend the Offer with or without any prior notice and reason,” Air India Express stated.

In conclusion, this promotional sale offers an opportunity for budget-conscious travelers to secure affordable flights in advance, though with certain terms and conditions.

item.title: Gautam Gambhir Refuses To Confirm Rohit Sharma's Place In XI For Sydney Test, Says This - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Gautam Gambhir Refuses To Confirm Rohit Sharma's Place In XI For Sydney Test, Says This

Publication Date: December 31, 2024

Source: NDTV Sports

The future of India captain Rohit Sharma in the playing XI for the Sydney Test is uncertain due to his poor form in the ongoing Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

  • Rohit has only scored 31 runs in five innings, averaging a disappointing 6.20.
  • Calls for his replacement have surfaced from fans and experts amid his struggles.
  • Gautam Gambhir, the India coach, has indicated that a final decision on the XI has not yet been made.
  • Gambhir expressed confidence in India’s ability to win the match and retain the Border Gavaskar Trophy.
  • Akash Deep will miss the Sydney Test due to a back injury.
“We had just one conversation in our dressing room - how we will win the next test, as it is important for us.” - Gautam Gambhir

The upcoming match is crucial for India to keep their hopes alive for qualifying for the WTC final.

item.title: Question mark over Rohit’s place in side: Gambhir says decision to be made “after a look at pitch” - The Indian Express
item.description:
Questions Surround Rohit Sharma's Place in Indian Cricket Team Ahead of Final Test

Publication Date: Not mentioned
Source: Indian Express

Speculations surrounding the future of Indian captain Rohit Sharma have increased as the team prepares for the final Border-Gavaskar Trophy Test at Sydney. Coach Gautam Gambhir indicated that a decision on Rohit's inclusion will depend on the pitch conditions.

  • Rohit's current average in the series stands at 6.20.
  • Gambhir states that the decision will be made after assessing the pitch.
  • Concerns over Rohit's poor form and multiple dismissals have led to questions about his place in the team.
  • Rohit's scoring sequence since September has been less than impressive, with low scores in recent matches.
  • India has a chance to draw the series 2-2, making Rohit's form even more critical.
“We shall look at the pitch and take a call tomorrow.” - Gautam Gambhir

The situation presents a pivotal moment for Rohit Sharma, with the team's chances in the series resting on the decision of the management regarding his selection.

item.title: Tesla Cybertruck explodes outside Trump hotel in Las Vegas, killing one - The Hindu
item.description:
Tesla Cybertruck Explosion Outside Trump Hotel in Las Vegas Claims One Life

Publication Date: January 02, 2025 | Source: The Hindu

At least one person was killed and seven wounded when a Tesla Cybertruck exploded outside a hotel belonging to US President-elect Donald Trump in Las Vegas, police reported.

  • The explosion occurred on January 1, 2025, at the Trump International Hotel.
  • Authorities are investigating any potential links between this explosion and a truck attack in New Orleans on the same day.
  • The explosion was termed an isolated incident by local law enforcement.
  • The Tesla contained gasoline, camping fuel, and fireworks, which contributed to the explosion.
  • Elon Musk stated that the explosion was caused by fireworks or a bomb in the vehicle, not a fault of the vehicle itself.
  • The explosion did not damage the hotel’s glass doors, as much of the blast went upward.
“Thus far, there's nothing to report on that score.” - President Joe Biden regarding connections to New Orleans attack.

The explosion has raised concerns about security and potential terror links, but authorities have found no solid evidence connecting the incidents.

item.title: Netflix accidentally REVEALS 'Squid Game' Season 3 release date - Details Inside - The Times of India
item.description:
Netflix Accidentally Reveals 'Squid Game' Season 3 Release Date

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

In a surprising turn of events, Netflix has inadvertently disclosed the release date for the highly anticipated third season of 'Squid Game'. Fans are buzzing with excitement as details emerge.

  • Netflix's announcement was made during a press conference.
  • The third season promises to delve deeper into the themes of survival and competition.
  • Production is set to begin in early 2024.
  • The show's global audience is expected to grow further with the upcoming season.
“We are thrilled to continue the journey of 'Squid Game' and explore even more dramatic twists.” - Netflix spokesperson

This accidental reveal has sparked a wave of speculation and anticipation among fans, eager to see what unfolds in the next season.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office Day 28: Allu Arjun film welcomes 2025 in style - India Today
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 28: Allu Arjun's Film Welcomes 2025 in Style

Published On: Jan 2, 2025

Source: India Today

Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2: The Rule welcomed 2025 in style, with a significant increase in box office collection on January 1.

  • The film earned ₹1,184 crore nett in India over 28 days.
  • On January 1, it saw a 70% increase in collection, earning ₹13.15 crore nett on that day.
  • The Hindi version generated ₹9.5 crore nett, while the Telugu version earned ₹3.15 crore nett.
  • The total earnings include ₹774.65 crore nett from the Hindi version and ₹330.53 crore from the Telugu version.
  • Pushpa 2 aims for a ₹2,000-crore gross worldwide milestone.
“Pushpa 2 is still continuing its dream run in theatres, especially in the Hindi belt.”

The film, directed by Sukumar, features Allu Arjun alongside Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil. It has been a record-breaking success globally.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Raha Kapoor enjoy first sunset of 2025 with extended family in Thailand. See pic - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Raha Kapoor enjoy first sunset of 2025 with extended family in Thailand

Publication Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, and their daughter Raha Kapoor are enjoying their New Year's celebration in Thailand with extended family. The gathering includes several notable family members, capturing memorable moments during their holiday.

  • Riddhima Kapoor shared a family portrait on Instagram, saying, “Memories made together last a lifetime.”
  • The family includes familiar faces like filmmaker Ayan Mukerji, Alia's sister Shaheen Bhatt, and mother Soni Razdan.
  • A touching video of Ranbir embracing Alia at midnight was shared by Neetu Kapoor on Instagram.
  • Ranbir and Alia will next be seen in the movie Love & War.
A touching video captured the moment Ranbir ran to embrace Alia as the clock struck midnight.

The Kapoor family's New Year celebration in Thailand highlights the joy of family gatherings and the warmth of shared experiences.

item.title: New Orleans attack: Video shows suspect Shamsud Din Jabbar dodging police barricade before ramming truck - The Times of India
item.description:
New Orleans Attack: Video Shows Suspect Dodging Police and Ramming Truck into Crowd

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Local News

Video footage has surfaced of suspect Shamsud Din Jabbar evading police barricades before an incident where he drove a truck into a crowd in New Orleans. This shocking event has raised concerns over public safety and police response times.

  • Shamsud Din Jabbar dodged multiple police barricades.
  • The truck ramming incident occurred during a crowded event in New Orleans.
  • Authorities are investigating the timeline and law enforcement’s response.
  • The video evidence is expected to play a crucial role in the investigation.
“This incident highlights serious issues in crowd management and law enforcement procedures.” - Police Chief

The community is left shaken after this alarming event, prompting discussions on safety measures at public gatherings.

item.title: Delhi cafe owner’s wife posted about ‘toxicity, abuse’ on Instagram days before his suicide - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Delhi Cafe Owner's Wife Posts About Abuse Before His Tragic Death

Date: January 2, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

The tragic suicide of a popular cafe owner in Delhi has brought attention to allegations of marital discord and mental harassment. Just days before his death, his wife posted on Instagram about her escape from 'toxicity and narcissistic abuse.'

  • The cafe owner was found hanging in his home on December 31 amid ongoing divorce proceedings.
  • His wife hinted at marital issues in a now-deleted Instagram post, mentioning struggles with 'toxicity.'
  • Family members of the deceased blame the wife for instigating his suicide.
  • Authorities are investigating claims of mental harassment from both families.
“We have seized the mobile phone, and the family’s claims are being verified.” - Bhisham Singh, DCP North West Delhi

The circumstances surrounding his death highlight serious issues of domestic disputes and mental health, emphasizing the need for support and intervention in such cases.

item.title: 'Always poses a challenge': Pat Cummins praises Jasprit Bumrah ahead of Sydney Test - The Times of India
item.description:
Pat Cummins Praises Jasprit Bumrah Ahead of Sydney Test

Date: January 3, 2023
Source: Times of India

Australia captain Pat Cummins has heaped praise on India’s pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah, acknowledging his exceptional form and consistent ability to trouble batters across all formats. Speaking ahead of the fifth and final Test of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy at the Sydney Cricket Ground, Cummins admitted that facing Bumrah is always a daunting task.

  1. Cummins praised Bumrah’s exceptional form and consistent ability to trouble batters.
  2. Cummins admitted that facing Bumrah is always a daunting task.
  3. Australia has the chance to secure the Border-Gavaskar Trophy and secure their place in the World Test Championship final with a win or draw in Sydney.
  4. Australia has confirmed changes in their lineup, with Mitch Marsh dropped and Beau Webster set to make his debut.
  5. Mitchell Starc has been retained despite carrying a rib niggle.
"Bumrah is bowling well at the moment. He is always tough. Hopefully, by the time I come in, late in the day, he has bowled quite a bit, which might make it a bit easier for me. But he is bowling well. I’ve faced him quite a bit across the world in different formats, and he always poses a challenge."

Cummins confirmed a few changes in Australia’s lineup, with all-rounder Mitch Marsh dropped following a string of underwhelming performances, and Beau Webster set to make his debut. Mitchell Starc has been retained despite carrying a rib niggle and will feature in the bowling attack alongside Cummins, Scott Boland, and Nathan Lyon.

item.title: New Orleans truck attack: Joe Biden says FBI found ISIS-inspired Shamsud-Din Jabbar posted videos hours before rampage - Hindustan Times
item.description:
ISIS-Inspired Attack in New Orleans: President Biden Condemns Rampage, FBI Investigates

Date & Source: January 1, 2025, Hindustan Times

Introduction: A truck attack in New Orleans on New Year's Eve left at least 15 people dead and dozens injured, with the FBI linking the suspect to ISIS-inspiration.

  1. US Army veteran Shamsud-Din Jabbar, inspired by ISIS, drove a pickup truck into a crowd on Bourbon Street.
  2. Jabbar posted videos hours before the attack, expressing his desire to kill.
  3. President Joe Biden condemned the attack, offered condolences, and assured the public that the FBI is investigating.
  4. The truck attack turned festive Bourbon Street into a macabre mayhem of maimed victims and fleeing pedestrians.
  5. The FBI believes Jabbar was not solely responsible and is investigating potential associates and explosives found at the scene.

“This is not just an act of terrorism. This is evil.” - New Orleans Police superintendent Anne Kirkpatrick

Conclusion: The FBI is actively investigating the New Orleans truck attack, treating it as an act of terrorism, with President Biden offering condolences to the victims and their families.

item.title: HS yearbook pic of woman who was set ablaze on NYC subway train goes viral, victim was known for ‘million dollar smile’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
HS yearbook pic of woman who was set ablaze on NYC subway train goes viral, victim was known for ‘million dollar smile’

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Debrina Kawam, a victim of a horrific crime on a Brooklyn subway, is remembered through her viral yearbook photo. Known for her 'million dollar smile', she aspired to be a flight attendant and struggled with homelessness before her tragic death.

  • Debrina Kawam was set ablaze while asleep on a subway train.
  • She aspired to be a flight attendant and was known for her vibrant personality.
  • The suspect, Sebastian Zapeta-Calil, has been indicted for murder and arson.
  • Kawam's life experiences included homelessness in NYC.
  • She graduated from Passaic Valley Regional High School in 1985.
“It is the most serious statute in New York state law, and my office is very confident about the evidence in this case and our ability to hold Zapeta accountable for his dastardly deeds,” - Brooklyn District Attorney Eric Gonzalez.

This tragic incident shines a light on the issues of violence in public spaces and the struggles faced by individuals experiencing homelessness.

item.description:

The GIFT Nifty indicates a negative start for the day, with oil steady and gold having a significant annual gain since 2010.

“Hope you're all set for today's trade, we wish you a profitable day ahead.”

Expectations are mixed as traders assess future monetary policies and global market conditions.

item.title: Jennifer Garner’s family 'wants' her back with ex Ben Affleck especially after… - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Garner's Family Hopes for Reunion with Ex-Husband Ben Affleck

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 06:57 AM IST

Jennifer Garner's family is rooting for a reunion between the actress and her ex-husband Ben Affleck, as the former couple has been spending quality time together with their children, including during holidays. While Garner maintains a relationship with her current beau, John Miller, her family believes there's still chemistry between her and Affleck.

Garner and Affleck, who share three children, have been spotted together recently, fueling speculation about a possible reconciliation. The 'Gone Girl' star is currently going through a high-profile divorce from Jennifer Lopez.

  1. Garner's family is hoping for a reunion.The former couple has been spending more time together.Affleck's friends and family are supportive of a reunion.Garner's current partner, John Miller, may feel like a 'third wheel.'
"Ben is laying it on thick, he’s giving Jen so much of himself and his attention and being so charming," a source told In Touch. "It’s very hard not to love him when he’s acting this way, and a lot of people are predicting that they could end up back together."

While there's no confirmation of a reunion, Garner's family and friends are optimistic about the possibility of the former couple getting back together.

item.title: Pushpa 2 India Box Office Day 28 (Early Trends): Almost 70% Jump & 1208 Crore – Allu Arjun Is Still Screaming Jhukega Nahi Saala! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 India Box Office Day 28 (Early Trends): Almost 70% Jump & 1208 Crore – Allu Arjun Is Still

Publication Date: January 1, 2024 Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 continues to dominate the box office, recording an estimated earning of 1208 to 1209 crore in its 28th day, with expectations to potentially reach 1500 crore.

Key Points:

  • Estimated earnings of 1208-1209 crore after 28 days.
  • Almost 70% jump in earnings on the fourth Wednesday.
  • Projected profits of 141.6% based on its 500 crore budget.
  • The film's Telugu version is estimated to gross around 330 crore.
  • Discussion about a possible Pushpa 3 sequel.

Notable Quotes:

"It might not be an exaggeration to believe it might hit 1500 crore!"

Overall, Pushpa 2 has significantly impacted the box office landscape, setting high standards for upcoming films.
